canChangeCopyRequiresWriterPermissionRes.description: Whether the current user can change the copyRequiresWriterPermission restriction of this shared drive
canChangeCopyRequiresWriterPermissionRes.title: Can Change Copy Requires Writer Permission Restriction
canChangeCopyRequiresWriterPermissionRes.displayName: Can Change Copy Requires Writer Permission Restriction

canShare.description: Whether the current user can rename this shared drive
canShare.title: Can Share

canDeleteDrive.description: Whether the current user can delete this shared drive. Attempting to delete the shared drive may still fail if there are untrashed items inside the shared drive.
canDeleteDrive.title: Can Delete Drive

canDeleteChildren.description: Whether the current user can delete children from folders in this shared drive
canDeleteChildren.title: Can Delete Children

canReadRevisions.description: Whether the current user can read the revisions resource of files in this shared drive
canReadRevisions.title: Can Read Revisions

canCopy.description: Whether the current user can copy files in this shared drive
canCopy.title: Can Copy

canChangeDriveBackground.description: Whether the current user can change the background of this shared drive
canChangeDriveBackground.title: Can Change Drive Background

canDownload.description: Whether the current user can download files in this shared drive
canDownload.title: Can Download

canListChildren.description: Whether the current user can list the children of folders in this shared drive
canListChildren.title: Can List Children

canRename.description: Whether the current user can rename files or folders in this shared drive
canRename.title: Can Rename

canChangeDomainUsersOnlyRestriction.description: Whether the current user can change the domainUsersOnly restriction of this shared drive
canChangeDomainUsersOnlyRestriction.title: Can Change Domain Users Only Restriction
canChangeDomainUsersOnlyRestriction.displayName: Can Change Domain Users Only Restriction

canChangeDriveMembersOnlyRestriction.description: Whether the current user can change the driveMembersOnly restriction of this shared drive
canChangeDriveMembersOnlyRestriction.title: Can Change Drive Members Only Restriction
canChangeDriveMembersOnlyRestriction.displayName: Can Change Drive Members Only Restriction

canManageMembers.description: Whether the current user can add members to this shared drive or remove them or change their role
canManageMembers.title: Can Manage Members

canEdit.description: Whether the current user can edit files in this shared drive
canEdit.title: Can Edit

canTrashChildren.description: Whether the current user can trash children from folders in this shared drive
canTrashChildren.title: Can Trash Children

canAddChildren.description: Whether the current user can add children to folders in this shared drive
canAddChildren.title: Can Add Children

canRenameDrive.description: Whether the current user can rename this shared drive
canRenameDrive.title: Can Rename Drive

canComment.description: Whether the current user can comment on files in this shared drive
canComment.title: Can Comment

adminManagedRestrictions.description: Whether the options to copy, print, or download files inside this shared drive, should be disabled for readers and commenters. When this restriction is set to true, it will override the similarly named field to true for any file inside this shared drive.
adminManagedRestrictions.title: Admin Managed Restrictions

domainUsersOnly.description: Whether access to this shared drive and items inside this shared drive is restricted to users of the domain to which this shared drive belongs. This restriction may be overridden by other sharing policies controlled outside of this shared drive.
domainUsersOnly.title: Domain Users Only

driveMembersOnly.description: Whether access to items inside this shared drive is restricted to its members
driveMembersOnly.title: Drive Members Only

copyRequiresWriterPermission.description: Whether the options to copy, print, or download files inside this shared drive, should be disabled for readers and commenters. When this restriction is set to true, it will override the similarly named field to true for any file inside this shared drive.
copyRequiresWriterPermission.title: Copy Requires Writer Permission

useDomainAdminAccess.description: Whether to issue the request as a domain administrator; if set to true, then the requester will be granted access if they are an administrator of the domain to which the shared drive belongs
useDomainAdminAccess.title: Use Domain Admin Access

q.description: Query string for searching shared drives. See the "Search for shared drives" guide for supported syntax.

useDomainAdminAccess.title: Use Domain Admin Access

keepRevisionForever.description: Whether to set the 'keepForever' field in the new head revision. This is only applicable to files with binary content in Google Drive. Only 200 revisions for the file can be kept forever. If the limit is reached, try deleting pinned revisions.
keepRevisionForever.title: Keep Revision Forever

ocrLanguage.description: A language hint for OCR processing during image import (ISO 639-1 code)
ocrLanguage.title: OCR Language

convertToGoogleDocument.description: Whether to create a Google Document (instead of the .txt default format)
convertToGoogleDocument.title: Convert to Google Document

useContentAsIndexableText.description: Whether to use the uploaded content as indexable text
useContentAsIndexableText.title: Use Content As Indexable Text

binaryPropertyName.description: Use this field name in the following nodes, to use the binary file data
binaryPropertyName.title: Put Output File in Field

drawingsToFormat.description: Format used to export when downloading Google Drawings files
drawingsToFormat.title: Google Drawings

sheetsToFormat.title: Google Sheets

docsToFormat.description: Format used to export when downloading Google Docs files
docsToFormat.title: Google Docs

slidesToFormat.description: Format used to export when downloading Google Slides files
slidesToFormat.title: Google Slides

emailMessage.description: A plain text custom message to include in the notification email
emailMessage.title: Email Message

useDomainAdminAccess.description: Whether to perform the operation as domain administrator, i.e. if you are an administrator of the domain to which the shared drive belongs, you will be granted access automatically.
useDomainAdminAccess.title: Use Domain Admin Access

transferOwnership.description: Whether to transfer ownership to the specified user and downgrade the current owner to a writer
transferOwnership.title: Transfer Ownership

sendNotificationEmail.description: Whether to send a notification email when sharing to users or groups
sendNotificationEmail.title: Send Notification Email

moveToNewOwnersRoot.description:
This parameter only takes effect if the item is not in a shared drive and the request is attempting to transfer the ownership of the item.

When set to true, the item is moved to the new owner's My Drive root folder and all prior parents removed.
moveToNewOwnersRoot.title: Move To New Owners Root
